name: Ideogram V3 Text to Image Generator Kie AI
description:
Generates images from text prompts using the Ideogram V3 model via the Kie.ai API, with options for style, speed, size, and more.
Can generate up to 4 images at once.
Pricing (as of November 2025) per image: $0.0175 for Turbo, 7 $0.035 for Balanced, or $0.05 for Quality.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

expand_prompt.description: Wether to enable automated prompt improvement (may increase processing time). Defaults to False

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image(s) (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate. Max length : 5000 characters.

style.description: Optional style type to generate with. Must be one of 'AUTO', 'GENERAL', 'REALISTIC', 'DESIGN'. Defaults to 'AUTO'

negative_prompt.description: Optional negative prompt to avoid in image generation. Max length : 5000 characters. Defaults to None (omit if not provided)

rendering_speed.description: Optional rendering speed to use. Must be one of 'TURBO', 'BALANCED', 'QUALITY'. Defaults to 'BALANCED'

image_size.description: Optional image size. Must be one of 'square', 'square_hd', 'portrait_4_3', 'portrait_16_9', 'landscape_4_3', 'landscape_16_9'. Defaults to None (omit for API default)

seed.description: Optional seed for reproducible generation. Defaults to None, a random seed is chosen.

num_images.description: Optional number of images to generate. Must be 1-4. Defaults to 1

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where images are saved

status.description: Status of the operation (success, error, etc.)

task_id.description: The ID of the generation task

temporary_image_urls.description: List of temporary URLs for generated images
